argument.name: filter_expression
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (all records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value. Selects records from the form's primary table.

argument.name: order_expression
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (record number order). A character order expression that sorts selected records.

item.name: .T. = Display a warning message if the filter expression returns no records.

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The name of the table.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.BASEQUERYRUN() method sets the base filter and order expressions for a layout. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.BaseQueryRun("lastname > 'B'", "lastname + firstname", .t., "customer")

section.description: The following code removes the layout's base filter and order expressions.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.BaseQueryRun("", "")
